member.name: D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies multiple wait flags for multiple fences.

member.name: D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAGS.D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: No flags are being passed. This means to use the default behavior, which is to wait for all fences before signaling the event.

member.name: D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAGS.D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAG_ANY
member.summary: Modifies behavior to indicate that the event should be signaled after any one of the fence values has been reached by its corresponding fence.

member.name: D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAGS.D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAG_ALL
member.summary: An alias for D3D12_MULTIPLE_FENCE_WAIT_FLAG_NONE, meaning to use the default behavior and wait for all fences.
